69% of organizations are planning to migrate existing applications to the cloud in the next 18 months. But mapping applications to the right cloud footprint is challenging. In fact, 81% of organizations who migrate to the cloud report problems with cost over-runs, performance or both. Don't let this happen to you and your team.
Check out this video to see how Turbonomic can help you accelerate your AWS migration and help you optimize your AWS instance after your migration is complete.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/turbonomic-and-aws/turbonomic-aws-demo?utm_campaign=70157000001bYQKAA2]]>
Turbonomic empowers you to continuously optimize your entire hybrid state – both on-premises and on AWS, at scale, assuring the performance of your applications for the lowest possible cost.
